outputs.output_descr:
The project will mainstream sustainable land management into St. Kitts and Nevis' social and economic development agenda and build institutional and individual human resource capacities for sustainable land management with environmental benefits accruing to forest and agricultrual lands estimated at 6,000 hectares.  The outputs associated with this project are:
Output 1:  Sustainable Land Management mainstreamed into national policies, plans and regulatory frameworks.
Output 2.  Individual and institutional capacities for sustainable land management developed.
Output 3:  Capacities for knowledge management in support of sustainable land management are developed.
Output 4:  Investment planning & resource mobilisation for implementation of 
sustainable land management interventions elaborated.  
Output 5:  Adaptive management and learning.

project_descr: CAPACITY BUILDING AND MAINSTREAMING FOR SUSTAINABLE LAND MANAGEMENT (SLM) IN ST. KITTS AND NEVIS
